title: Calls go blank both direction as soon as its answered
content:
When I make or receive calls, through SIM or whatsapp calls, I cannot hear anything nor does the other person hear anything. The call just goes blank and the phone sometimes freezes. 
I have also tried resetting it to factory settings, deleting all data. It does not work. I have changed SIM cards too still no luck. 
My phone may not be covered by warranty but should a over $1000 phone fail in its most basic function so soon.
